basics.summary: Communications professional teaching English in Asia.

work.summary: Supervising up to 5 staff members. Inventory, customer service and closing duties.

work.company: Jeollanamdo Office of Ed. - Suncheon High School
work.summary: Implemented curriculum for senior high school conversational English. Speaking evaluations. Workshops and professional development seminars for teachers.

Led direct response programs for a 5-10 client portfolio including UNHCR, CPAWS and Canadian Museum of Civilization Corporation. Managed client relationships, messages, branding and campaign strategy.

Designed organization communication strategies and media plans for science and legal campaigns. Secured national and local television, radio and print coverage across three offices (Toronto, Vancouver, Ottawa). Managed two direct reports.

Marketing and web strategies for projects including Web of Change social media conference in Toronto, online strategy for Gregor Robertson and Vision Vancouver’s 2008 election campaign and focus groups for McAllister Opinion Research.

Managed a $2 million direct response program. Coordinated market research and graphic design of the organization’s rebranding campaign. Managed project budgets and managed multiple suppliers and contractors.

Created and implemented strategies for seasonal fundraising campaigns. Secured corporate and media sponsorships. Launched coordinated television, radio and public events alongside successful direct mail campaigns.
Managed direct mail program. Wrote web content, media releases, newsletters, and grant applications. Coordinated website redesign and branding.
